query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ai_prediction_history (
    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    prediction_type ENUM('cpk', 'oee', 'defect_rate', 'trend') NOT NULL,
    model_id INT,
    model_name VARCHAR(100),
    model_version VARCHAR(50),
    product_id INT,
    product_code VARCHAR(100),
    production_line_id INT,
    workstation_id INT,
    predicted_value DECIMAL(15,6) NOT NULL,
    predicted_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    forecast_horizon INT DEFAULT 7,
    confidence_level DECIMAL(5,2),
    confidence_lower DECIMAL(15,6),
    confidence_upper DECIMAL(15,6),
    actual_value DECIMAL(15,6),
    actual_recorded_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    absolute_error DECIMAL(15,6),
    percent_error DECIMAL(10,4),
    squared_error DECIMAL(20,8),
    is_within_confidence INT,
    status ENUM('pending', 'verified', 'expired') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_hist_type (prediction_type),
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_hist_product (product_id),
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_hist_line (production_line_id),
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_hist_predicted_at (predicted_at),
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_hist_status (status)
)
command:

    predicted_value DECIMAL(15,6) NOT NULL,
    predicted_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    forecast_horizon INT DEFAULT 7,
    confidence_level DECIMAL(5,2),
    confidence_lower DECIMAL(15,6),
    confidence_upper DECIMAL(15,6),
    actual_value DECIMAL(15,6),
    actual_recorded_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    absolute_error DECIMAL(15,6),
    percent_error DECIMAL(10,4),
    squared_error DECIMAL(20,8),
    is_within_confidence INT,
    status ENUM('pending', 'verified', 'expired') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_hist_type (prediction_type),
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_hist_product (product_id),
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_hist_line (production_line_id),
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_hist_predicted_at (predicted_at),
    INDEX idx_ai_pred_hist_status (status)
)
